Signal Explanations.rst: an input reset signal that, when asserted, initializes the counter, digit selection, and output segment
Signal Explanations.digit_select: an internal control signal that alternates the active digit of the 7-segment display

Logical Operators Explanation.s_eventually: a temporal operator indicating that the contained condition must eventually hold at some future clock cycle
Logical Operators Explanation.||: logical OR operator meaning that at least one of the conditions must be true
Logical Operators Explanation.==: equality operator checking if two values are equal

Assertion 1.Assertion Explaination: eventually, either the condition that the reset signal is asserted holds or the condition that the control signal for selecting the display digit is set holds, meaning that one of these situations must occur at some future clock cycle
